neighbors.name: Rettie J. Harding
neighbors.claims: Rettie J. Harding is a long-time resident of Spotsylvania County, listed as the owner of the property at 8853 Pamunkey Rd ([National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/h/rettie-harding/)). This address corresponds with parcel data in the surrounding Pamunkey Road area ([Realtor.com](https://www.realtor.com/realestateandhomes-detail/8853-Pamunkey-Rd_Spotsylvania_VA_22551_M52979-45893)). Public records indicate she is part of the local Atkins family, being the sister of the late Harry Atkins, a lifelong Spotsylvania resident ([Free Lance-Star](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/fredericksburg/name/harry-atkins-obituary?id=13096203)). No evidence of public participation in zoning hearings or development comments was found.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private resident with local family ties but no documented public leadership roles.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage by acknowledging her long-standing family roots in the county. Focus on visual buffers and maintaining the quiet rural character of her property, as she appears to be a private resident without commercial interests.

neighbors.name: Rose Lee Gilbert
neighbors.claims: Rose Lee Gilbert (also listed as Rose L. Gilbert) is a resident of Spotsylvania County associated with the property at 8885 Pamunkey Rd ([National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/g/rose-gilbert/)). She is the wife of Jack Gilbert; the Gilbert family has a presence in the area, with relatives owning adjacent or nearby properties ([Free Lance-Star](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/fredericksburg/name/sylvia-gilbert-obituary?id=12533611)). There is no record of her speaking publicly on solar or land use development in available county minutes.
neighbors.influence_justification: Long-term resident with extended family in the area; no public office found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with respect for family legacy, noting that other Gilbert family members live nearby. Assure her that the project will not disrupt family property cohesion or degrade the inheritance value of the land.

citations.claim: Rose Lee Gilbert is a resident of Spotsylvania County associated with the property at 8885 Pamunkey Rd
citations.title: Rose Gilbert - Spotsylvania, VA Public Record

citations.claim: She is the wife of Jack Gilbert; the Gilbert family has a presence in the area
citations.title: Obituary: Sylvia A. Gilbert (Granddaughter)

neighbors.name: Sharon Crabtree
neighbors.claims: Sharon Crabtree is the recorded owner of the property at 8834 Pamunkey Rd (Parcel 44-A-10E), which she purchased in June 2025 ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/VA/Spotsylvania/8834-Pamunkey-Rd-22551/home/15585215)) ([Homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/8834-pamunkey-rd-spotsylvania-va/n8kzx0mxp4cjm/)). She is a prominent local educator who founded the 'Learn 'n Play' Preschool in Spotsylvania in 1988, a business that emphasizes nature-based learning and outdoor play on wooded acreage ([Learn 'n Play](https://www.learnnplay.com/about-us)). While she has not taken a documented public stance on solar development, her professional philosophy highlights a connection to nature and wooded environments.
neighbors.influence_justification: Founder of long-standing local preschool serving 100+ families; respected educator.

approach_recommendations.engage: Leverage her background in education and nature. Frame the project's landscaping plan as a way to support local biodiversity (pollinators) and maintain the 'wooded' aesthetic she values. Avoid technical jargon; focus on environmental stewardship.

citations.claim: Sharon Crabtree is the recorded owner of the property at 8834 Pamunkey Rd (Parcel 44-A-10E), which she purchased in June 2025
citations.title: Property History: 8834 Pamunkey Rd

citations.claim: She is a prominent local educator who founded the 'Learn 'n Play' Preschool in Spotsylvania in 1988
